data.name: Big Root
data.summary: Held: Increases HP recovered from draining moves, Ingrain, and Aqua Ring by 3/10 (30%).
data.description: Held: HP restored from Absorb, Aqua Ring, Drain Punch, Dream Eater, Giga Drain, Ingrain, Leech Life, Leech Seed, and Mega Drain is increased by 30%.  Damage inflicted is not affected.
